title: Fish20 Non-technical Overview
description: Hi there! I'm Juan, a web developer and lawyer, presenting my first online game and full-stack software engineering project. The video showcases my game, named Fish20, with lots of interactive features. Viewers can try the game, leave feedback, and even save scores. I explain the game's modes, features, and the show user navigation. Your feedback is highly appreciated! GitHub: https://github.com/ichbinderbar/fish-react Go play: https://main.d3tq94steyolaz.amplifyapp.com/

title: Fish20 Game Tutorial
description: In this video, I, Juan, the creator of Fish20, explain how to play the game. The goal is to earn 20 coins before your opponent by strategically collecting cards. I demonstrate how to select cards from the table and use a hook card to capture them. Viewers are instructed on card types, capturing rules, and earning points. GitHub: https://github.com/ichbinderbar/fish-react Go play: https://main.d3tq94steyolaz.amplifyapp.com/

title: Face Controlled Music Player
description: In this video, I showcase my music player app. This app can detect seven different moods and plays a song corresponding to each mood based on facial expressions. I demonstrate how the app works without playing the songs due to copyright concerns. Stay tuned for a separate video featuring a special guest interacting with the app. GitHub: https://github.com/ichbinderbar/play-face-hackathon Go play: https://facecontrolmusicplayer.netlify.app/
